ch.epfl.biop.operetta

Class OperettaManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.epfl.biop.operetta.OperettaManager

  • public class OperettaManager
extends Object
    Operetta Manager class This class handles all the Operetta logic to extract data

    The entry point is to call the OperettaManager.Builder class to create the correct OperettaManager object

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  OperettaManager.Builder
      This Builder class handles creating OperettaManager objects for you

      • createReader

        public static IFormatReader createReader(String id)
                                  throws IOException,
                                         FormatException
        Initializes the reader for this series and makes sure to use Memoization
        Parameters:
        id - the String path to the xml file
        Returns:
        a BioFormats Reader with memoization
        Throws:
        IOException - an error while reading the data
        FormatException - and error regarding the data's format

        Returns:
        the minimum value for normalization

        Returns:
        a reader that is initialized to your dataset

      • getAvailableWells

        public List<ome.xml.model.Well> getAvailableWells()
        Returns the list of all Wells in the Experiment This is currently configured to work only with one plate, but this method could be extended to work with Experiments containing multiple plates.
        Returns:
        a List of wells

      • getWell

        public ome.xml.model.Well getWell(int row,
                                  int column)
        convenience method to recover the well associated to a given row and column (0 indexed for both)
        Parameters:
        row - the row (0 indexed) of the well
        column - the column (0 indexed) of the well
        Returns:
        the well that matches the provided Row, Column indexes

      • getAvailableFieldIds

        public List<Integer> getAvailableFieldIds()
        Returns a list of Field Ids (Integers) for the Experiment. We cannot return a list of Fields (WellSamples in Bioformats slang) because these are unique to each Well. The Ids, however, are the same between all Well.
        Returns:
        a list of Ids that corresponds to all available fields per well

      • getAvailableFields

        public List<ome.xml.model.WellSample> getAvailableFields(ome.xml.model.Well well)
        For a given well, what are all the fields WellSample contained within
        Parameters:
        well - the selected well
        Returns:
        a list of Fields (WellSamples)

      • getWellImage

        public ij.ImagePlus getWellImage(ome.xml.model.Well well,
                                 int downscale,
                                 Roi subregion)
        Overloaded method, for simplification See getWellImage(Well, List, int, HyperRange, Roi) for a complete breakdown
        Parameters:
        well - The well to export. All fields will be stitched
        downscale - the downscale factor
        subregion - a square ROI to extract
        Returns:
        the resulting ImagePlus ( C,Z,T Hyperstack ), calibrated

      • getWellImage

        public ij.ImagePlus getWellImage(ome.xml.model.Well well,
                                 int downscale,
                                 HyperRange range,
                                 Roi subregion)
        Overloaded method, for simplification See getWellImage(Well, List, int, HyperRange, Roi) for a complete breakdown
        Parameters:
        well - The well to export. All fields will be stitched
        downscale - the downscale factor
        range - the C Z T range to extract, as a HyperRange
        subregion - a square ROI to extract
        Returns:
        the resulting ImagePlus ( C,Z,T Hyperstack ), calibrated

      • getWellImage

        public ij.ImagePlus getWellImage(ome.xml.model.Well well,
                                 List<ome.xml.model.WellSample> fields,
                                 int downscale,
                                 HyperRange range,
                                 Roi subregion)
        Exports the current well for the selected samples at the selected C Z T coordinates and for the given subregion into an ImagePlus
        Parameters:
        well - The well to export. All fields will be stitched
        fields - the fields to export
        downscale - the downscale factor
        range - the C Z T range to extract, as a HyperRange
        subregion - a square ROI to extract
        Returns:
        a calibrated ImagePlus

        public ij.ImageStack readSingleStack(ome.xml.model.WellSample field,
                                     int downscale,
                                     HyperRange range,
                                     Roi subregion)
        Method to read a single stack from a field
        Parameters:
        field - the field to export
        downscale - the downscale factor
        range - the range in C Z T to use
        subregion - an optional subregion roi, set to null for none
        Returns:
        an ImageStack

      • process

        public void process(int downscale,
                    Roi region,
                    boolean is_fields_individual)
        this method tries to simplify the processing for a full export
        Parameters:
        downscale - the downscale factor
        region - an optional Roi to export, set to null for whole image
        is_fields_individual - export each field individually or as a stitched well

      • process

        public void process(List<ome.xml.model.Well> wells,
                    List<Integer> fields,
                    int downscale,
                    Roi region,
                    boolean is_fields_individual)
        this method tries to simplify the processing for a full export
        Parameters:
        wells - all the Wells to process as a list
        fields - all the Field IDs to process, as a list, set to null to process all
        downscale - the downscale factor
        region - an optional Roi to export, set to null for whole image
        is_fields_individual - export each field individually or as a stitched well

      • getIOBytes

        public long[] getIOBytes(List<ome.xml.model.Well> wells,
                         List<Integer> fields,
                         int downscale,
                         boolean is_fields_individual)
        TODO : fix estimation of output bytes - check if this is correct
        Parameters:
        wells - all the Wells to process as a list
        fields - all the Field IDs to process, as a list, set to null to process all
        downscale - the downscale factor
        is_fields_individual - export each field individually or as a stitched well
        Returns:
        array of bytes that will be read from the dataset and written to the export folder when calling process(List, List, int, Roi, boolean)

      • getIODimensions

        public long[] getIODimensions(int downscale)
        Returns all dimensions for the data that we wish to export for size and time estimations
        Parameters:
        downscale - an eventual downscale factor
        Returns:
        an array with the full dataset sizes(sX, sY, sZ, sC, sT) and selected or downscaled sizes (sXOut, sYOut, sZOut, sCOut, sTOut)

        public String toString()
        Overrides:

      • writeWellPositionsFile

        public void writeWellPositionsFile(List<ome.xml.model.WellSample> samples,
                                   File position_file,
                                   int downscale)
                            throws IOException
        writeWellPositionsFile can write the coordinates of the selected individually saved wells to a file to use with Plugins > Stitching > Grid/Collection Stitching...
        Parameters:
        samples - the list of samples (Fields) that will be written to the positions file
        position_file - the filename of where the position file will be written
        downscale - the downscale with which to adjust the coordinates
        Throws:
        IOException - error in case of problem working with the positions file

      • getIntersectingFields

        public List<ome.xml.model.WellSample> getIntersectingFields(List<ome.xml.model.WellSample> fields,
                                                            Roi bounds)
        Finds fields related to the bounds that were given, to limit the number of files to export
        Parameters:
        fields - the fileds to check intersections in
        bounds - the roi for which we are looking for the intersecting fields
        Returns:
        a List of fields (WellSample s) that intersect with the given Roi

      • getFieldAdjustedCoordinates

        public Point getFieldAdjustedCoordinates(ome.xml.model.WellSample field,
                                         Roi bounds,
                                         Roi subregion,
                                         Point topleft,
                                         int downscale)
        Returns the final coordinates of a field based on all given arguments.
        Parameters:
        field - the field (WellSample)
        bounds - a roi, null if none
        subregion - a subroi
        topleft - the top left coordinate point
        downscale - the downsample factor
        Returns:
        the new coordinate for the given Field

        Returns:
